nodes.title: Understand Excel basics
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with the Excel interface, including worksheets, cells, rows, and columns. [Microsoft Excel Training](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/excel-training-center-7b3c6a46-0cdc-4c3f-8fbe-db3c4d04cb22)

nodes.title: Set up a worksheet
nodes.desc: Learn how to create and format a new worksheet, including setting up headers and footers. [Excel Easy](https://www.excel-easy.com/basics/create-a-new-worksheet.html)

nodes.title: Practice with sample data
nodes.desc: Use sample data to practice and reinforce your Excel skills. [Microsoft Excel Training](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/excel-training-center-7b3c6a46-0cdc-4c3f-8fbe-db3c4d04cb22)

nodes.title: Join online communities
nodes.desc: Participate in online forums and communities to ask questions and learn from others. [Reddit - r/excel](https://www.reddit.com/r/excel/)

nodes.title: Watch video tutorials
nodes.desc: Watch video tutorials to learn new skills and stay up-to-date with the latest features. [YouTube - Excel Is Fun](https://www.youtube.com/user/excelisfun)

nodes.title: Read Excel blogs
nodes.desc: Stay current with the latest Excel news, tips, and tricks by reading blogs. [Excel Is Fun](https://www.excelisfun.com/)

nodes.title: Take online courses
nodes.desc: Take online courses to learn specific skills or to prepare for certification. [Coursera - Excel](https://www.coursera.org/courses?query=excel)

nodes.title: Get certified
nodes.desc: Consider getting certified in Excel to demonstrate your skills and knowledge. [Microsoft Certification](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/learning/certification.aspx)

nodes.title: Enter and edit data
nodes.desc: Understand how to enter and edit data in cells, including formatting numbers and text. [Microsoft Excel Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/enter-and-edit-data-in-excel-2a3e6d8f-3a6f-43a5-8c6b-8bdf7a1f7a5d)

nodes.title: Use formulas and functions
nodes.desc: Learn how to use basic formulas and functions, such as SUM, AVERAGE, and COUNT. [Excel Formulas](https://www.excel-formulas.net/)

nodes.title: Create charts and graphs
nodes.desc: Understand how to create visualizations, including column charts, line charts, and pie charts. [Excel Charts](https://www.excelcharts.com/)

nodes.title: Use conditional formatting
nodes.desc: Learn how to highlight cells based on conditions, such as values, formulas, and formatting. [Microsoft Excel Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/use-conditional-formatting-to-highlight-cells-8a5a8c6a-8f8a-4c4f-8a3a-4c8b4e8b8a4f)

nodes.title: Manage multiple worksheets
nodes.desc: Understand how to create, rename, and manage multiple worksheets in a single workbook. [Excel Easy](https://www.excel-easy.com/basics/multiple-worksheets.html)

nodes.title: Use pivot tables
nodes.desc: Learn how to create and customize pivot tables to summarize and analyze data. [Microsoft Excel Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/create-a-pivot-table-8c5c7d4f-7b4e-4fbd-8d9f-7b7a6e9e3d6a)

nodes.title: Use Excel shortcuts
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with common Excel shortcuts to improve productivity. [Excel Shortcuts](https://www.excelshortcuts.net/)

nodes.title: Use Excel add-ins
nodes.desc: Learn how to install and use add-ins, such as Power Query and Power Pivot. [Microsoft Excel Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/use-add-ins-in-excel-8c5c7d4f-7b4e-4fbd-8d9f-7b7a6e9e3d6a)
